pullrequest.title: Smaller green buttons, and make theme default

content.raw: I think there is still a bug here because it only adds the default stylesheet if the `'stylesheet'` key is not in the data dictionary. But I suspect that the previous code (which sets it to an empty string if it didn't exist) means that the key does exist for everyone who has previously launched BLACS with the old code. At least I think that's what is happening, I could be wrong. Need to test with a fresh install of BLACS without an existing BLACS settings h5 file, and see if after a restart, the stylesheet key exists.
content.html: I think there is still a bug here because it only adds the default stylesheet if the 'stylesheet' key is not in the data dictionary. But I suspect that the previous code (which sets it to an empty string if it didn't exist) means that the key does exist for everyone who has previously launched BLACS with the old code. At least I think that's what is happening, I could be wrong. Need to test with a fresh install of BLACS without an existing BLACS settings h5 file, and see if after a restart, the stylesheet key exists.
